Token.Abstract: Called after Apple Pay payment is authorized successfully. All the shipping data entered are merged into the existing PaymentData.

Parameter.Name: paymentData
Parameter.Abstract: A paymentData object conforming to CMPPaymentDataProtocol.

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: Response received after exexuting payment request.

Token.Abstract: Called after Apple Pay payment failed to be authorized.

Parameter.Name: paymentData
Parameter.Abstract: A paymentData object conforming to CMPPaymentDataProtocol.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Returns the error if the authorization was not successful.

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: Response received after exexuting payment request.

Token.Abstract: Called when User has selected a new payment card. Use this delegate callback if you need to update the summary items in response to the card type changing (for example, applying credit card surcharges).

Parameter.Name: paymentMethod
Parameter.Abstract: A PKPaymentMethod object containing details of the selected payment method.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A block that is called to pass PKPaymentSummaryItem objects in order to update the summary items in response to the card type changing.

Token.Abstract: Called when User changes shipping data.
Token.Declaration: - (void)applePayPaymentDidSelectShippingContact:(nonnull PKContact *)contact completion:(nonnull void ( ^ ) ( PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus authorizationStatus , NSArray<PKPaymentSummaryItem*> *summaryItems ))completion

Parameter.Name: contact
Parameter.Abstract: A PKContact object containing details of the selected shipping data.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A block that is called to pass a PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus object and PKPaymentSummaryItem objects in order to update the summary items in response to the shipping data changing.
